original_text:
Epic MONOPOLY II
Il Monopoly (italianizzato Monopoli) è un gioco da tavolo dalle origini parecchio antiche: fu creato da Elizabeth Magie e pubblicato per la prima volta all’inizio del XX secolo, dal 1935 è stata la Parker Brothers a commercializzarlo e dal 1991 risulta essere di proprietà della Hasbro.
È diffuso in tutto il mondo, sono 103 Paesi ad avere la licenza ed è stato tradotto in oltre trentasette lingue. Lo scopo del gioco è quello di dominare una sorta di mercato immobiliare costruendo case, alberghi e palazzi e incassando le rendite dei giocatori che si fermano nelle caselle corrispondenti. Vince a Monopoly il giocatore che riesce a mandare in fallimento tutti gli altri.
Si stima che nel mondo abbiano giocato a Monopoly circa 750 milioni di persone, rendendolo probabilmente il gioco da tavolo più famoso di tutti i tempi.
Epic Monopoly II, dal catalogo della software house William Interactive (WMS), è una trasposizione fedelissima del gioco da tavolo in versione slot machine online. Non c’è molto da dire sulla grafica, ovviamente mancano del tutto gli effetti speciali e non sono presenti animazioni tridimensionali, ma non se ne sente la mancanza!
Caratteristiche principali della slot
Il gameplay di Epic Monopoly II non è particolarmente complicato ma non è nemmeno troppo lineare, per scoprire tutti i trucchi e le funzionalità di questa slot tuttavia, è possibile giocare in modalità play for Fun in maniera del tutto gratuita, senza dover effettuare una registrazione o scaricare programmi: in questo modo potrete fare allenamento e conoscere alla perfezione i segreti del gioco prima di investire dei soldi veri.
Epic Monopoly II ha una struttura tradizionale con i classici cinque rulli principali, a questi però si aggiungono anche altri cinque rulli detti “Colossal”, mentre le linee di pagamento sono ben 100.
Su Epic Monopoly II si possono effettuare delle puntate a partire da un minimo di 50 centesimi fino a un massimo di 50 €, mentre la vincita più alta a cui si può ambire è fissata a 1.500 volte il valore della scommessa.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (Return to player o RTP) di questa slot di casa WMS si attesta su un canonico 96%, in linea con le altre slot dello stesso provider.
Epic Monopoly II presenta diversi giochi bonus, tra i quali una sorta di ruota della fortuna chiamata Epic Wheel, che viene attivata quando sui rulli compaiono almeno tre Scatter.
Tra i mini-giochi presenti ci sono un lancio di dadi, dei giri gratuiti, moltiplicatori e, ovviamente, dei premi in denaro.
Slot simili a Epic Monopoly II
Le slot machine a tema Monopoly stanno diventando popolari quasi quanto l’omonimo gioco da tavolo e sono diverse le software house che le inseriscono nel proprio catalogo.
La stessa WMS ne offre più di una e continua ad aggiornare le versioni per proporre giochi sempre più innovativi; alcuni esempi sono Monopoly Mega Movers e Monopoly Once Around Deluxe.
Tra le varie proposte di giochi a tema Monopoly ricordiamo poi Monopoly Big Event e Monopoly Bring the House Down.

raw_translation.response:
Epic MONOPOLY II is a fantastic slot game brought to you by William Interactive (WMS), capturing all the thrilling elements of the classic board game. Don't be fooled by the lack of flashy graphics and 3D animations; its faithful reproduction still manages to impress experienced gamblers.

The gameplay of Epic MONOPOLY II is straightforward yet complex enough to keep you entertained and engaged. If you want to master all the tricks and features of this slot, you can practice in the play-for-fun mode without registering or downloading any software.

This slot machine features five main reels and an additional five "Colossal" reels, with 100 pay lines. With minimum bets starting at 50 cents and reaching a maximum of €50, the highest possible payout is 1,500 times your original bet.

The RTP of Epic MONOPOLY II is a respectable 96%, in line with other WMS slots. Players can win big with several bonus games, including the Epic Wheel, a Fortune-like wheel triggered by landing three Scatters. Mini-games like dice rolls, free spins, multipliers, and cash prizes are also included.

WMS offers other Monopoly-themed slot games, such as Monopoly Mega Movers and Monopoly Once Around Deluxe, to satisfy their players' thirst for winning. Epic MONOPOLY II is a must-try for all gamblers seeking an unforgettable gaming experience.

response.headline: Gameplay Experience
response.content:
Epic MONOPOLY II is like playing the traditional board game, but with the chance to win actual money - without risking bankruptcy or a family feud. William Interactive (WMS) has done a great job of creating a game that still keeps the classic Monopoly feel, with the familiar Mr. Monopoly character hovering on the side of the reels.

But don't let the simplicity of the game trick you into thinking the gameplay is dull. The 100 paylines and five colossal reels give players the chance for some epic wins (hence the title). It's like rolling the dice and landing on Boardwalk every time.

Overall, the gameplay is easy to follow, making it perfect for novice players who just want to have some fun. But the exciting features, like the 'Epic Wheel Bonus', offer enough variety for seasoned players to stick around and press spin for hours on end.

response.headline: BONUS FEATURES
response.content:
If you thought the classic board game was already too exciting, wait until you see Epic MONOPOLY II's bonus features! This game offers so many ways to win big, it's almost like they've spread Monopoly money all over the reels! You know, if that money was real, we would definitely prefer this game to the actual board game.

When you land three or more scatters, you'll activate the 'Epic Wheel' feature. If you're lucky enough, you'll get to roll the dice and move around the board! Every space on the board includes amazing prizes, like free spins, multipliers, and cash prizes. It's like going around the board in real life, but without all the family arguments and property taxes.

The Maya warrior should be an eye-catching element in the foreground, drawing attention to the game's theme and gameplay. dalle-prompt.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
dalle-prompt.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Epic MONOPOLY II".

        Please provide a detailed prompt for DALLE to create a feature image fitting the game
        
        - The image should be in cartoon style
        - The should feature a happy Maya warrior with glasses

        Review: Epic MONOPOLY II is a faithful translation of the classic board game into an online slot machine by William Interactive (WMS). With 100 paylines and traditional five main reels along with an additional five "Colossal" reels, this game may not have special effects or 3D animations, but it undoubtedly delivers on its promise. As an experienced gambler, you will appreciate that the gameplay is not overly complicated but still has enough tricks and features to keep you engaged.

The betting range starts from a minimum of 50 cents up to a maximum of 50 €, with the highest payout of 1,500 times the value of your bet. The theoretical Return to Player (RTP) of 96% places it in line with other WMS slots. You can play Epic MONOPOLY II for fun without any registration or downloads, allowing you to perfect your strategy before investing real money.

Epic MONOPOLY II offers exciting bonus games that include a "Wheel of Fortune" feature called the Epic Wheel, which starts when three or more scatters appear on the reels. The mini-games include dice rolls, free spins, multipliers, and cash prizes. WMS has other Monopoly-themed slots in their catalog, such as Monopoly Mega Movers and Monopoly Once Around Deluxe.

Overall, Epic MONOPOLY II is an entertaining and potentially profitable game that should appeal to experienced gamblers.

message.content:
Prompt for DALLE:

Create a feature image that captures the essence of Epic MONOPOLY II. The image should be in cartoon style, featuring a happy Maya warrior wearing glasses. The warrior should be standing in front of a Monopoly board with an overjoyed expression on their face. The Monopoly board should be full of colorful houses, hotels, and tokens. There should also be a large "Epic Wheel" in the background, hinting at the game's exciting bonus feature.

The image should have a vibrant and energetic feel, with bold colors that pop and catch the player's eye. The Maya warrior should be an eye-catching element in the foreground, drawing attention to the game's theme and gameplay. The overall design should be playful and fun, creating a sense of excitement and anticipation in the player.
